Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Diversey
ShortDescription: Eastbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
